plot: During a crisis, a man decides to take a special treatment. When he wakes up in the next century, he finds out his problems are still the same.
title: Pasión por lo efímero
plot_es: During a crisis, a man decides to take a special treatment. When he wakes up in the next century, he finds out his problems are still the same.
plot_en: During a crisis, a man decides to take a special treatment. When he wakes up in the next century, he finds out his problems are still the same.

produce.name: Escuela Internacional de Cine y Televisión (EICTV)
